  4. GenAI's dirty secret: It's set to create a mountainous increase in e-waste  The Register
  5. AI will add to the e-waste problem. Here’s what we can do about it.  MIT Technology Review

item.title: Meta builds AI search engine to cut Google, Bing reliance, the Information reports - Reuters
item.description:
1. Meta builds AI search engine to cut Google, Bing reliance, the Information reports  Reuters
  2. Meta is reportedly working on its own AI-powered search engine, too  The Verge
  3. Meta Develops AI Search Engine to Lessen Reliance on Google, Microsoft  The Information
  4. Meta is reportedly developing a search engine for its chatbot  Engadget
  5. Meta work on search engine a ‘sentiment negative’ for Google, says BofA  Yahoo Finance
